product_name: Picnic At Ascot Deluxe Picnic Cooler for 4
long_description: For a family picnic or couples date, bring along the insulated, fully equipped Deluxe Picnic Cooler for 4 from Picnic at Ascot. It separates food and wine and keeps everything chilled.
short_description: For a family picnic or couples date, bring along the insulated, fully equipped Deluxe Picnic Cooler for 4 from Picnic at Ascot. It separates food and wine and keeps everything chilled.
